price: 58. (Estos) contestaron: “Hemos sido enviados (para castigar) a un pueblo de pecadores (el pueblo del Mensajero Lot),
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qālū innā ur'sil'nā ilā qawmin muj'rimīna
